Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_PAUL>
This town may be in the middle of nowhere, but
I really enjoyed the food at the restaurant.
Backwoods cooking is the best!

<NAME_MOB_PAUL>
They had more ingredients in stock than last
time, so I bought...a lot more than I probably
should have.

<NAME_MOB_PAUL>
I guess the quality of the food at the restaurant
stems from the ready availability of quality local
ingredients...

<NAME_MOB_PAUL>
This town's restaurant is the best! There are new
menu items now, and I made sure to order them
AAAAAALL...

<NAME_MOB_PAUL>
I was just talking about this town's restaurant. It
has quite the reputation!

<NAME_MOB_PAUL>
I know you get what you pay for, but...I mean,
I'd be okay getting something a liiiittle
shoddier...

<NAME_MOB_PAUL>
It's great that this town's gotten more well-
known, but every silver lining has its cloud.
<PAGE>
For instance, the restaurant here is waaaaay too
crowded now.

<NAME_MOB_PAUL>
I came for the restaurant, but if the restaurant is
full, my journey may have been in vain...

<NAME_MOB_PAUL>
The food at the restaurant here is breathtaking. I
really must try to get a recipe or two from the
owner!
